General.Name: Argosy Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Argosy Minerals Limited engages in the exploration and development of lithium projects in Argentina and the United States. Its flagship project is the Rincon lithium project that covers an area of approximately 2,794 hectares of mining concessions located within the Salar del Rincon in Salta Province, Argentina. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Perth, Australia.

1.Name: Ms. Andrea Simone Betti A.C.I.S., C.A., M.B.A.
1.Title: Company Sec.
